1.content: Who will you follow at first ?
1.title: Start

choices: Kate finds some shrunken people on the island
Some of the passengers are shrunk
She finds a way to shrunk anyone she wants to
11.content: What's the kind of story ?
11.title: Kate Austen

14.content: What will be your choice ?
14.title: Claire Littleton

choices: Climb on her for a better look
141.content:
It was a sunny day on the island, like almost every day to be honest. But Claire couldn't do anything more than taking a sunbath at the beach, thought that she tried to help the camp by her way. Being pregnant didn't mean she was useless, and she intented to prove it. But today, there were nothing she could really do. So she took a nap at the beach, when something's strange happenned : she felt like a presence all around her. It was not her companions, it was something different, she couldn't tell.

On the meantime, a man being too curious about the "giant visitors" coming from the sky was walking around a giant blonde and pregnant woman. His friends warned him to not approach any giant, but it was useless. And now he looked at a giant beautiful woman sleeping on the sand, wondering what to do.
141.title: Claire (pregnant) finds some tiny people

info.brief_description: The Oceanic flight 815 survivors discovers some tinies people on the Island.
info.description:
*WORK IN PROCESS*

A story where the females characters of Lost find some tiny people on the island.
